title: Top 10 Breathtaking and Affordable Hotel in South Africa
text:
Travel Articles | July 29, 2015 
The first thing that comes to a person’s mind when the think of travel is accommodation. A place to stay is most definitely a prerequisite to travelling somewhere and if you get a good place to stay, nothing could be better. Whether you are on a business trip, a vacation, or any other journey, getting a proper place to stay is very important. Your travel could all be a mess or pure bliss just determined by the place you are staying in. Looking and searching for the best of the hotels to stay in can at times be a headache, but this is what could also make your travelling worthwhile. 
A hotel to stay in is one of the topmost requirements while travelling to somewhere. It has to be comfortable, safe, secure and easily accessible. 
South Africa can get you a number of comfortable and exotic hotels if you travel to the place. If money is what you are worried about, shun that away. By making use of the Hotels.com Coupon Codes , you can save a lot of your hard earned money to stay in the best of the hotels. 
For your travel this time around, we offer you a list of top 10 breath-taking and affordable hotels in South Africa: 
1. The Farmhouse Hotel 
This hotel in Langebaan is one of its oldest with spcious rooms and exquisite décor. You can get to stay at as less as $67. 
2. Ritz Backpackers 
In this hostel and can get you the best of sevices if you are money conscious and comfort loving the same time. You can stay for the night at as less as $22 in this Johannesburg hostel. 
3. KiteLab guesthouse 
This hotel in Langebaan is the best you can get in the area in a low price as that of $28 and have all the lavishing services of a guest house. 
4. Brown Sugar Backpackers 
It is yet another Johannesburg hostel you will again be on the top at saving money and being comfortable as you could pay as less as $24 per night to stay here. 
5. Point Village Hotel 
This hotel in Mossel Bay is a clean, spacious and affordable hotel you could be very comfortable in staying if you are in the area. 
6. City Lodge Hotel 
This Hotel is very affordable if you want to stay in Fourways. You can get as much as 50% discount if you book a room online. 
7. Tarragona Lodge 
This hotel is 11 kilometers from the City Centre and 21 kilometers from Cape Town. It gives you services like outdoor pools, Rooftop terrace, Breakfast available just in as little as $46. 
8. Harbouredge Apartments 
In the Cape Town City Centre, this hotel can be booked at $40 with a multitude of brilliant services. 
9. Hotel Le Sokhamon 
This three star hotel in Dakar can be had with exceptionally great services just at around a $100 per night on a twin sharing basis. 
10. The Bay Hotel
